feed.title: Gentle Wash Records
feed.subtitle: Independent record label Estd. 2014 by Andrea Callea to release his solo music projects.

entry.title: Embroidering on Silence, Vol. II
entry.content:
Embroidering on Silence, Vol. II is the second instalment of a series entitled Embroidering on Silence. Initially composed as a bespoke live show for Cronosfera III. Subsequently, one that I also played at the following events, with different iterations and refinements, between 2012 and 2016:

  • Cronosfera III
  • Elektroshow con Aner Andros
  • Terra Incognita
  • A Night Ofâ€¦

To find the creative motivation, necessary to work on releasing something so dated, this release comprises of an entirely new mix that only partially reflects the afore-mentioned original composition and previous revisions. Live recordings of Cronosfera III and Terra Incognita shows are available solely on Bandcamp, as bonus tracks.

Credits

  • Embroidering on Silence Vol. II
